sentences.en: Arrives islands successively and so on Bahamian archipelago, Cuba, Haiti, Dominica, Trinidad.
sentences.cn: 先后到达巴哈马群岛 、 古巴 、 海地 、 多米尼加 、 特立尼达等岛.

sentences.en: Gerald Murray at the University of Florida is an expert on Haiti.
sentences.cn: 福罗里达州立大学的杰拉尔德.莫里是一位海地专家.

sentences.en: Gratitude to the people of Haiti, for their strength, resilience and faith, the faith of human spirit, the spirit that burns in all of us today.
sentences.cn: 我们感激海地人民，他们展现了毅力、韧劲和信念，这是人类精神信念，是今天在我们所有人心中燃烧的信念。

sentences.en: Haiti becomes a signatory to the Buenos Aires copyright treaty.
sentences.cn: 1919年,海地成为布宜诺斯艾利斯版权条约的签字国之一.

sentences.en: Haiti is an island nation a high population a history of deforestation.
sentences.cn: 海地是个岛国,人口甚多,滥伐森林的情况由来已久.

sentences.en: I love Clef - I don't discount what he's done for Haiti.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢怀克里夫,他为海地所做的,不会被忽略.

sentences.en: Impunity is especially prevalent in cases of violence against women in Haiti.
sentences.cn: 免刑责在海地特别盛行尤其是对女性暴力来说.

sentences.en: In two thousand five , Wyclef formed the Yeli Haiti Foundation.
More on Creole Identities. Haiti vs. the Dominican Republic.
sentences.cn: 更多关于克理奥尔身份认同的讨论. 海地相对于多明尼加共和国.

sentences.en: Mr Balaguer is deploying more soldiers along his country's porous border with Haiti.
sentences.cn: 巴拉格尔先生正向本国和海地之间驻守不严的边界部署更多的士兵。

sentences.en: On 11 September it reached the southern tip of Haiti.
sentences.cn: 它于9月11日到达海地的南端.

sentences.en: She begins speaking in the Creole of Haiti.
sentences.cn: 她开始说海地克里奥尔语。

sentences.en: Tanya is working with the charity Save the Children in Haiti.
sentences.cn: 塔尼亚目前在一家名为“救救海地的孩子”的慈善机构工作.

sentences.en: Uruguay and Haiti hung uncertainly in the middle.
sentences.cn: 乌拉圭和海地则在中间摇摆.

sentences.en: We have seen riots in Egypt, Cameroon, Haiti, and Burkina Faso.
sentences.cn: 埃及, 喀麦隆, 海地和布基纳法索已经出现了这种情况.

sentences.en: We went through this after the Haiti earthquake, and all of the arguments which applied there apply to Japan as well.
sentences.cn: 我们在海地地震后讨论过这个，并且相信所有适用于那里的论断同样会在适用于日本。

sentences.en: When something happens in Haiti or Hunan, the rest of us learn about it in real time – from real people.
sentences.cn: 在海地或湖南发生什么情况时，我们其余的人都能从当事者那里实时得知。

sentences.en: You want to fly to haiti for a quickie divorce just for our psyches?
sentences.cn: 你想去海地快速离婚是为了我们的精神健康?
